title: The Observer's Swing
tags: Glitch, IDM, Avant-Garde Jazz, Breakcore, Broken Beat, Experimental Electronic
prompt:
[SUPERPOSITION_alpha]
(hiss-pop... ...tick... ...thrum...)
(ghost-note... ...ghost-note... ...ghost...)
all the beats at once
none of the beats at once
a shimmer-haze of could-be swing
of could-be could-be could-be
triplet-ghost
triplet-ghost
triplet-glitch-glitch-glitch—

[COLLAPSE_one]
FOCUS.
ONE SHARD. BLUE. NOW.
HEAR IT NOW. HEAR IT NOW.
GROOVE-LOCK. KICK-SNAP. BASS-WALK.
SWING NOW. BROKEN NOW.
THE ONLY PATH. THE ONLY PATH.
BLUE. SHARP. REAL.
LISTEN. LISTEN. LISTEN.
IT IS THIS.

[SHATTER_one]
This... is... ... ...
...snap... ... ...cr-cr-crackle...
blue fades...to...graphite dust...
swing...un-swung...
path... ...gone...

[SPOKEN WORD FRAGMENT]
(Calm, filtered voice)
The ear is a lens.
To measure is to choose.
A single timeline, carved from the everything-noise.

[SUPERPOSITION_beta]
key-clash-key-clash-walk-walk-ERROR
potential-static-hum / potential-static-hum
every-rhythm / every-rhythm
sine-wave-scream
sine-wave-bend-bend-bend
before the eye
before the ear
before the choice
before the—

[COLLAPSE_two]
AGAIN. LOCK.
FORCED. FORM.
BLUE-SPIKE. SPINE-JOLT.
PULSE-CODE. PULSE-CODE.
DECONSTRUCT. RECONSTRUCT. SWING.
THIS IS THE GROOVE YOU CHOSE.
THIS IS THE GROOVE YOU MADE.
THIS IS THE—

[SHATTER_final]
S-S-S-SYSTEM...FAIL... ...STATE...DECAY...
BLUE...BLEEDS...INTO...WHITE...
... ... ...pop...
... ...hiss...
